articles.title: Asian Games discus throw champion Praveen Kumar Sobti, who boomed on small screen as Bhim, passes away - The Indian Express
articles.description: Ace of mace, the towering throws medallist from 60s and 70s and the much-adored actor dies at 74.

articles.title: Chinese women's Asian Cup win sparks calls for gender pay equality - FRANCE 24
articles.description: The dramatic triumph of China's women footballers at the Asian Cup has sparked calls on social media for equal pay, with commenters contrasting their performance with the dismal men's side.
